casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Gregory Allen GANT. No. 234P05-3. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 31, 2016. Daniel P. O'Brien, Special Deputy Attorney General, for State of N.C. Gregory Allen Gant, Laurinburg, for Gant, Gregory Allen. Matthew Delbridge, District Attorney, for State of N.C.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 30th of March 2016 by Petitioner for Petition for Discretionary Review:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 31st of March 2016."
